title: Marc by Marc Jacobs Typeface
content:
Hey typophiles!

Does anyone know what typeface Marc Jacobs uses, or if it is a custom typeface? I'm thinking it is similar to engraver's gothic?

If you know, is there anywhere I can get it, or something similar without costs? Or if not, where to purchase it for a decent price?

Thanks,  
Cat
author: catastrophe

comments.content:
It certainly does look a lot like [Engraver's Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018104343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/), Cat.

As for your other questions, I think that 24 bucks is a pretty decent price for a good typeface.

I have Engravers and I have prblems with the font having very tight leading. Leading to cut off letter tops and unsightly over laps.

I think I will contact bitstream soon regarding a fix.

Mikey :-)
